apis.description: Gets or registers notifications for an institution

operations.notes: Retrieves the most recent notifications for your institution. By default, will return the 20 most recent notifications. Notifications can be specified using the optional parameters. Requires authentication via OAuth, to an account that has "admin" permission.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Return notifications that come on or after this date. "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS" format.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Return notifications that before this date. "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS" format.

parameters.name: num_limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return, between 1 and 250. Default is 20.
